task: Parse an AWS S3 bucket name from a full S3 URI path (e.g., 's3://my-bucket-name/folder/file.txt') and extract just the bucket name
solution_criteria: The regex should correctly extract bucket names from S3 URIs, handling buckets with hyphens and numbers, and should not match the path components after the bucket name

task: Convert an AWS CloudFormation template JSON object to include a new S3 bucket resource with versioning enabled
solution_criteria: The JSON should be valid CloudFormation syntax, include a new S3 bucket resource with VersioningConfiguration enabled, and maintain the structure of existing resources

task: Write a Python function that takes an AWS IAM policy document as a dictionary and returns a list of all Action permissions granted in the policy
solution_criteria: The function should handle both string and list values for Action fields, extract all unique actions across all statements, and return them as a flat list
